ygData.subject: RE: Ykesha? Just say Yes-sha
ygData.msgSnippet: what i heard was that soon the ghoul lord will drop a sword that is warrior only with similar stats.  just a rumour as of now, i haven t heard this happening
ygData.messageBody:
what i heard was that soon the ghoul lord will drop a sword that is warrior
only with similar stats. just a rumour as of now, i haven't heard this
happening on any live servers yet.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L30 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Our newest (and our only) Level 50 - Donna the Barbarian
> Warrior - gave a
> shout on guildsay just last knight:
>
> "OMG!! The Lord with a Sword!!!"
>
> And she won it! WTG Donna!!! She is also the first female
> Barbarian Warrior
> to make 50 on our server!
>
> And then on the next spawn she goes:
>
> "OMG!!! Not again!!!"
>
> Yes, it spawned 2 times in a row. So, to whoever axed about
> Ykesha... yup
> still dropping!
>
> Sylly Songsynger
> Bard of the 36th Song
> <Spirit of the Moon>
> somewhere on Innoruuk
